itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss tonight's kick-off of the Democratic Convention and whether or not anyone will care about both "virtual conventions", if Americans will tune in, why AOC is must see tv for the Democrats, how the state of California is trying to tax people for moving for up to 10 years, and we close out the show with Bio-hacks and why Silicon Valley is obsessed with injecting teenager blood into their systems.
